
{{alias}}( str, words[, ignoreCase] )
    Removes all occurrences of the given words from a `string`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    str: string
        Input string.

    words: Array<string>
        Array of words to be removed.

    ignoreCase: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether to perform a case-insensitive operation.

    Returns
    -------
    out: string
        String with words removed.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( 'We lost the game, crap.', [ 'we', 'crap' ] )
    'We lost the game, .'

    // Case-insensitive:
    > out = {{alias}}( 'We lost the game, crap.', [ 'we', 'crap' ], true )
    ' lost the game, .'


    See Also
    --------
